column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////As for the main course
column2: I cannot order anything other than the Tonkotsu Black bowl ( hope my spelling is correct) with the pork belly. I love the egg! I assume its sous vide in soy sauce before added to the bowl. The ambiance is amazing
column4: although sometimes it can be slightly crowded
column5: oh and hot sake on tap! Jinya is definitely a must visit!
